title: Homemade Lemonade Recipe
description: You only need three ingredients to make this classic homemade Lemonade Recipe. It’s so simple and refreshing–perfect for a summer day!
steps: Combine 1 cup each of sugar and water and cook over medium heat until the sugar dissolves.
Set the syrup aside to cool for about 10 minutes.
Combine the cooled syrup and freshly-squeezed lemon juice in a pitcher.
Add the remaining water and stir, then pour over ice and enjoy!
